attributes.action: Stop Atos taking taxpayer's money, due to evidence of negligent assessments.
attributes.additional_details: Take a look at secretassessor1, after that I shall gladly prove my credentials.
attributes.background: Atos are a French IT company, who are deemed fit to be one of 3 providers of PIP assessments. I am an ex-assessor, with evidence to show almost daily failures in procedure and assessment techniques. Frank Field accepted a story last year that incentives were a one off. Again i can disprove this.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because we aren't sure what action you would like the UK Government or Parliament to take.

You could start a new petition calling on the Government to end private contracting out of PIP assessments if that's something you would like to see happen.
